function.name: textfromdocument
function.description: Extracts plain textual content from file at path.By default the extraction times out at 5 seconds. To change this simply provide a timeout in milliseconds.

example.description: Suppose you have a document at path containing the following content:

examples.example: Document Title +---+ I am a word document which |IMG| you need to do some operations +---+ on.
Document Title I am a word document which you need to do some operations on.
